summary: Completed bug fix verification testing for Ambulatorio Infermieristico. Key bug fixes verified: Agenda navigation (prev/next day buttons), removeChild error fix, and statistics page loading. Some testing limitations due to modal overlay issues preventing complete BodyMap and PICC management testing.

ui_bugs.issue: Dialog overlays intercepting clicks preventing navigation during testing
ui_bugs.impact: Affects user interaction when modals are open

integration_issues.issue: Unable to complete BodyMap marker testing due to modal overlay interference
Unable to complete PICC sheet testing due to navigation interference

passed_tests: Login with Domenico credentials working correctly
Agenda navigation prev/next day buttons changing dates correctly
Date picker showing correct Italian date format
Page navigation between main sections working
Agenda time slots displaying correctly (PICC and MED columns)
action_item_for_main_agent: Bug fixes verified successfully for agenda navigation and removeChild errors. Modal overlay issue needs investigation - dialogs are intercepting clicks and preventing smooth navigation. BodyMap and PICC management functionality needs retesting after modal overlay fix.

success_percentage.frontend: 75% (Main bug fixes working, modal overlay issues remain)
